rule.title: Rule Management
rule.copy_to_clipboard: All local rules copied to clipboard
rule.timeout_hint: Default 5 seconds, requests will be cancelled after this time
rule.item_img_from_src_desc_on: On: Use src attribute to get image
rule.item_img_from_src_desc_off: Off: Use data-original or other attributes
rule.wait_for_media_element: Wait for video element to load completely
rule.wait_for_media_element_desc: If enabled, will wait for video element to load before returning
rule.embed_video_selector_hint: Multiple selectors separated by commas, e.g.: iframe, #embed-player
rule.help_rule_name:
[Rule Name] Purpose: Set the name of this rule, used to display and distinguish different rules in the interface
Example: Sakura Anime, Dimension Anime, etc.
Requirements: Cannot be empty, recommend using the common name of the website
rule.help_website_domain:
[Website Domain] Purpose: Specify the domain name of the target website, used for matching and identifying web pages
Format: Enter only the domain name part, no protocol prefix required (such as http:// or https://)
Example: www.example.com, oneanime.com, etc.
Note: Supports main domain and subdomain, do not include path part
rule.help_logo_path:
[Logo Path] Purpose: Specify the path of the website logo, used for interface display
Format: Can use relative path or full URL path (without protocol prefix)
Example: logo.png, images/site-logo.svg, static/logo.jpg
Supports: Common image formats such as PNG, JPG, SVG
rule.help_search_item_img_selector:
[Search Image Selector] Purpose: Locate thumbnail elements on the search results page
Format: CSS selector syntax, used to extract image links from the list page
Example: img.thumbnail, .image-box img, [data-src], .cover-image
Common Types: img tags, divs with background images, data attributes, etc.
rule.help_detail_title_selector:
[Detail Title Selector] Purpose: Extract title content on the detail page
Format: CSS selector, usually a title tag or title class name
Example: h1.title, .detail-title, article h1, header h2
Recommendation: Prioritize elements with high uniqueness and stable structure
rule.help_detail_desc_selector:
[Detail Description Selector] Purpose: Extract description or summary information on the detail page
Format: CSS selector, usually a paragraph or description container
Example: .description, p.summary, .intro-text, .content-brief
Note: Select elements that contain key descriptive information
rule.help_detail_content_selector:
[Detail Content Selector] Purpose: Extract core content on the detail page
Format: CSS selector, usually the article body or content container
Example: .content, article, .detail-content, main div
Important: This is the key selector for scraping main content, please ensure accuracy
rule.help_enable_rule:
[Enable Rule] Purpose: Control whether this rule is effective
Enabled: Rule will be used, participating in web parsing
Disabled: Rule will be disabled, not participating in parsing process
Usage: Convenient for testing and managing multiple rules
